mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOVE_H ( POST_SEQ, ID, SEX, AREA, BIRTH ) VALUES ( #{post_seq}, #{id}, #{sex}, #{area}, TO_DATE(#{birth}) )
mapper.select: SELECT POST_SEQ, ID, LDATE, SEX, AREA, BIRTH FROM LOVE_H WHERE POST_SEQ=#{post_seq}
SELECT POST_SEQ, ID, LDATE, SEX, AREA, BIRTH FROM LOVE_H WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT POST_SEQ, ID, LDATE, SEX, AREA, BIRTH FROM LOVE_H WHERE ID=#{id} AND POST_SEQ=#{post_seq}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT POST_SEQ, COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM LOVE_H A WHERE LDATE >= #{start_day} AND LDATE < #{end_day} GROUP BY A.POST_SEQ ORDER BY TOTAL_CNT DESC ) T1 INNER JOIN POST_H T2 ON T1.POST_SEQ = T2.SEQ WHERE NOT STATE = '2' AND ID = #{id} ORDER BY TOTAL_CNT DESC, WDATE DESC)L1 NATURAL JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LOVE_H A INNER JOIN POST_H B ON A.POST_SEQ = B.SEQ WHERE LDATE >= #{start_day} AND LDATE < #{end_day} AND NOT B.STATE = '2' AND B.ID = #{id} )L2
